roleset.name: surpass, ruling over, be of greater importance or influence
roleset.note: DOMINATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dominate' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'dominated' based on BOLT-2,3; nominal 'domination' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls contiguous_location-47.8. (from dominate.01-v)
DOMINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from domination.01-n)
DOMINANCE-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to dominate.01. VN class contiguous_location-47.8-2. Framed by Katie. (from dominance.01-n)
DOMINION-N NOTES: Fleshed out by Julia for unification (from dominion.01-n)
DOMINANT-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to dominance.01 and dominate.01. Dominate.01 is a member of vn class contiguous_location-47.8-2. Framed by Katie. (from dominant.01-j)
DOMINATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from dominated.01-j)

example.name: doninate-v: active
example.text: Pioneer Electronic and Sony, both of which *trace* dominated buying earlier this month, continued to fall Wednesday.

example.name: doninate-v: passive
example.text: [The board]-1 is dominated *trace*-1 by the heirs of the late John T. Dorrance Jr., who controlled about 58% of Campbell's stock when he died in April.
example.arg: by the heirs of the late John T. Dorrance Jr., who controlled about 58% of Campbell's stock when he died in April

example.name: domination-n
example.text: In 1958 , the Iranian people overthrew the Shah and organized a popularly - elected government , but because this government did not listen to the US , the US immediately coordinated the CIA to overthrow it and restore the domination of the Shah .

example.name: dominance-n: Both args
example.text: Blue Arrow 's dominance of the U.S. temporary-help market

example.name: dominance-n: All args again
example.text: its dominance of the U.S. temporary-help market

example.name: dominance-n: With arg ms
example.text: Its growing dominance of multi-national companies in the Taiwanese music field

example.name: dominion-n
example.text: Nevertheless, many popular teachers assert that God lost his dominion over the Earth to Satan.

example.name: dominant-j: Dominant to what point?
example.text: The three tibial arteries are dominant to the foot.

example.name: dominant-j: With arg 1
example.text: [The lateral vein-1] reconstituted and [*-1]was dominant over the posterior vein.

example.name: dominated-j: args 0 & 1
example.text: Many of these fields are clearly still male dominated in the management areas .
